about_the_game:
About This Game

"Bail Force" merges the frenetic energy of classic action games with a dystopian cyberpunk aesthetic. In the gritty streets of New Rise City, bounty hunters Angel and Lea are society’s last line of defense. Choose your character, each driven by their own motives, and hunt down the city's most notorious criminals. Engage in fast-paced combat with an arsenal of melee and ranged weapons, enhanced by Add-Ons that tailor your gameplay. The Adaptive Combat System ensures that every encounter challenges you anew, as enemies learn and adapt to your fighting style.

Every chase will be different, and every chase can end your life.

Fight randomly generated enemies in randomly generated areas in the city, with randomly generated power-ups. After all, you never know where your target will run to. Equip Add-Ons, upgrades that enhance your movement and attacks in every way possible, and discover the most effective combination for your playstyle and character. Enemies will get stronger the more you defeat them, so make sure you have what it takes to survive. Attack in melee, use ranged weapons, jump, slide, and dash to evade attacks to survive and overcome any incoming threat towards your character.

Introducing our unique mechanic, Adaptive Combat System.

Daring to take action roguelite design to the next level, Bail Force introduces Adaptive Combat System, where your enemy will adapt from your preferred fighting style and adjust their capabilities accordingly, making combat more challenging and evolve as you play. In the information age, enemies will logically learn and find information about you and your fighting style, so as they adapt, you must face their challenge and beat them all for the sake of your mission.

Experience the depth of the story: Love, Revenge, Parting, and Conflict

Angel seeks vengeance, but his girlfriend Eris disapproves of her choice; Lea seeks to prevent that chain of revenge, driven by Eris' request. A conflict between co-workers ensue. Their intertwined fates lead to multiple storylines and endings, adding depth to your adventure. Dive into a story of conflict, survival, and evolution, where every decision counts and every battle is a test of skill and strategy.

short_description: Step into "Bail Force: Cyberpunk Bounty Hunters," a thrilling roguelite set in New Rise City. Play as Angel or Lea, bounty hunters battling adaptive enemies with a mix of melee and ranged combat. Experience unique storylines and multiple endings in a world where strategy and survival are key.
